# Government Tender Announcement: In-Service Support Piping for Rideau Falls Dam
## Tender ID: WS4022332250

**Project Description**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to provide in-service support to the dam de-icing piping at Rideau Falls. The requirement pertains to the pipe system from the valve chamber at the West Dam to the farthest end of the East Dam, excluding the underground piping on Green Island.

**Support Responsibilities**
The successful bidder will be responsible for:
* Providing assistance during start-up and shut-down of the system
* Performing annual cleaning, condensate purging, and nitrogen filling of the pipe
* Conducting annual inspections and reporting
* Conducting ultrasonic thickness testing in years 1 and 5
* Performing repairs on an as-and-when required basis, including work outside of regular working hours

**Mandatory Site Visit**
A mandatory site visit is associated with this requirement. Prior to accessing PROTECTED information, assets, or sites, personnel security screening is required.

**Proposal Submission**
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by **July 12, 2023** at **2:00 pm DST**.

**Contract Information**
The anticipated contract start date is **September 1, 2023**, with no expected end date.

**Eligibility**
This tender is open to all qualified bidders. Only bids from parties that have successfully completed the PSPC's Vendor Identification and Security (VIS) process will be considered.

**Contact Information**
For more information, please contact:
Pierre Lavigne (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: pierre.lavigne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Please note that replies to this tender will be made via the Ariba online procurement platform.
